original_title: Tuition classes for 2023 A/L exam prohibited from next week
original_body_lines: Conducting all tuition classes in preparation for the 2023 G.C.E Advanced Level Examination will be prohibited from midnight of December 29 until the end of the exam, the Department of Examinations announced.
Accordingly, conducting tuition classes, seminars, workshops, and other related activities targeting the examination will be prohibited from midnight on December 29.
The 2023 G.C.E. A/L exam is slated to commence on 04 January 2024, and will be held until 31 January 2024.
Meanwhile, the first phase of the third school term for the academic year 2023 will end on Friday (Dec. 22). The first phase of the third school term commenced on November 01, 2023.
The second phase of the third school term of all government and government-approved private schools is slated to begin on February 02, 2024, as per the Ministry of Education.
